alert.note: Alert for Glasscock; Howard; Martin; Midland; Mitchell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 9:19PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Glasscock, northwestern Mitchell, northeastern Midland, Howard and southern Martin Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 919 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Lomax, or 11 miles south of Big Spring, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Big Spring, Stanton, Coahoma, Forsan, Sand Springs, Lomax, Lenorah, Tarzan, Big Spring Country Club, Courtney, Big Spring McMahon-Wrinkle Airpark, Knott, Elbow and Stanton Municipal Aiport. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 149 and 202. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
